p: For differently expressed target genes, reverse transcription and qRT-PCR reactions were carried out by using PrimeScript™ RT Master Mix (Perfect Real Time) (TaKaRa, Beijing, China) and TB Green® Premix Ex Taq™ (Tli RNaseH Plus) (TaKaRa, Beijing, China), respectively. FtActin was used as the reference gene. All samples were performed three independent biological replicates. The relative expression level of each gene was calculated by using the 2 −ΔΔCt method. The primers used in this experiment are listed in Additional file 1: Table S12.
